skins.selfIntroduction: I am Renown, Battlecruiser of the Royal Fleet of the Royal Navy. I have experienced issues in both great wars, and have countless accomplishments for which I am proud. No matter what orders you give me, Commander, it is my duty to carry them out with all of my strength!
skins.acquisition: Renown, Battlecruiser of the Royal Fleet of the Royal Navy, at your service. My guns shall aim where your sword points, Commander.
skins.login: Commander, please give me your orders.
skins.details: All systems functioning properly. Do not worry, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle1: No instructions, Commander? So we're using the, 'wait and see' strategy...?
skins.secretaryIdle2: My propeller? Hood bumped into me one day, and before I reacted I received this in apology.
skins.secretaryIdle3: What? You think Renown is cute...? Well, on her behalf, I give you my tha... Wait, what?!
skins.secretaryTouch: ... It's a bit strange... Only you have ever done this to me, Commander...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ...!! Commander! I do not intend to resist... but still...
